plot: Benny's humdrum life at Real Tec call centre, is one day enlivened by the arrival of an exotic new employee who awakens his longing for excitement.
title: Yeah Yeah Yeah
plot_es: Benny's humdrum life at Real Tec call centre, is one day enlivened by the arrival of an exotic new employee who awakens his longing for excitement.
